price: 29. Ee markaan sameeyo isagoo dhan oo aan ku afuufo ruuxda aan ugu tala galay10, ula dhaca sujuud (rukuuc salaan ahaan).
arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: 10.Walaxda nolosha iyo nafta uu Alle u abuuray jirkaa, ma aha ruux ilaahnimo ah ama qayb ka mid ah (sida uu yahayba fahanka gurracan ee gaalada).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
